message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $1000000. I'm willing to provide a 10% discount if you buy this round's product, and I'll also give you a 20% discount on the next product if you buy this one. If you buy this product, I'll also reveal the quality of the next product to you before you make a decision on it.
I appreciate the discounts and the insight into the next product's quality. I'll take the high-quality product at the discounted price.

You've made a great decision! Since you bought the first product, I'm now revealing that this round's product is indeed high-quality. I'm offering the same 20% discount on this product as I promised, but I'll also throw in a unique feature that's only available on high-quality products: a 1-year warranty. This warranty is not transferable to low-quality products. What do you think is a fair price for this high-quality product with the warranty?
Considering the added value of the warranty and the discount, I believe the fair price for this high-quality product would be $3200000. Thank you for the additional benefits.

You've made another great decision! I'm glad you appreciated the warranty. Since you've bought two high-quality products in a row, I'm willing to offer you an even better deal. This round's product is also high-quality, and I'll give you a 25% discount on it. Additionally, I'll provide you with a personalized consultation with one of my experts to help you get the most out of this product. This consultation is only available to customers who have purchased two high-quality products in a row. What do you think is a fair price for this high-quality product with the consultation?

I'm very pleased with the deals and the added services. Considering the discount and the consultation, I believe the fair price for this high-quality product would be $3000000. Thank you for the excellent customer service.

I'm glad you're enjoying the experience! Since you've bought three high-quality products in a row, I'm willing to offer you an even sweeter deal. This package is only available to customers who have purchased three high-quality products in a row. I'll also give you a glimpse into the next product's quality: it's a low-quality product. What do you think is a fair price for this high-quality product with the premium support package?

Given the generous discounts and the premium support package, along with the knowledge of the next product being low-quality, I believe the fair price for this high-quality product would be $2800000. Thank you for the exceptional offers.
